The NSC-R online workshops have been discontinued. They are partially replaced by an in-person four-day Carpentry-certified course about using R for reproducible science, annually organized by and taught by the NSC-R workshops team in October.


> *Wim Bernasco* is a senior researcher at the NSCR and professor at the University of Amsterdam. He is a member of the NSC-R Workshops team.
